DataElement.preferredName: Sex Behavior Penis Anus Insert Assessment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: an event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation for yes, no and I prefer not to answer responses related to sexual behavior related to insertion of an external male reproductive organ into the lower opening of the digestive tract, lying in the cleft between the buttocks, through which fecal matter is extruded.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sex Behavior Penis Anus Insert Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to sexual behavior related to insertion of an external male reproductive organ into the lower opening of the digestive tract, lying in the cleft between the buttocks, through which fecal matter is extruded.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Behaviors involved with sexual arousal and/or intercourse.

Property.preferredDefinition: An external male reproductive organ. It contains a tube called the urethra, which carries semen and urine to the outside of the body.:(AY-nus) The opening of the rectum to the outside of the body.:Something inserted or to be inserted.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The male organ of urination and copulation.
The lower opening of the digestive tract, lying in the cleft between the buttocks, through which fecal matter is extruded.
Something inserted or to be inserted.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: AMC CRF:AIDS Malignancy Consortium Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: an event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation for yes, no and I prefer not to answer responses.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.origin: AMC CRF:AIDS Malignancy Consortium Case Report Form
